text: Carla Rubí Medina Villarreal (born June 29, 1984), better known as Carla Medina, Carla or Amiga de Alejandro Fernández is a Mexican TV host and singer. She hosted the Disney Channel program Zapping Zone. Medina provided the voice of Trixie in the Spanish soundtrack for Toy Story 3. ==Television== *Zapping Zone, 2002-2012 ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Monterrey Category:Mexican television presenters Category:Mexican people of Spanish descent
title: Carla Medina
